hero.description: I design clean, fast, and user-centered digital experiences.

projects_section.desc_v1: This is my first portfolio, a showcase of the beginning of my journey as a developer.
projects_section.desc_wedding: Shows guests all the event details and lets them RSVP.
projects_section.desc_v2: An improved version of my portfolio, with a better structure, a modern design, and reusable components.
projects_section.desc_birthday: Shows guests all the event details and lets them RSVP.

tweets.f1: 🏎️ F1 is my passion: speed, strategy, and excitement every Sunday. Nothing beats a good race! 🔥🇲🇽
tweets.lucha: 🤼‍♂️ Lucha libre: masks, flying moves, and passion. A vibrant art in every corner of Mexico 🇲🇽🔥
tweets.edm: 🎧 Nothing like getting lost in the beats of electronic music. Festivals, lights, and drops that shake your soul 🔊✨
tweets.travel: ✈️ Traveling is living a thousand lives in one. Each destination tells a new story. Backpack ready, soul free 🌍🧳
tweets.barca: 🔵🔴 Being a Barça fan is more than football. It’s history, passion, and love for the beautiful game. Visca el Barça! 💙❤️⚽
tweets.gaming: 🎮 Video games aren’t just fun, they’re worlds where I get lost, compete, and enjoy nonstop 👾🔥

jobs.paypal: Customer solutions agent at a global fintech company, resolving digital payment issues and enhancing customer experience.
jobs.teleperformance: Supervisor and agent at a global BPO, supporting U.S. banking clients and food delivery app customers.

certs.diplomadoanalisis: International Diploma in Computer Systems Analysis

objective.description: Below is a structured view of my journey as a developer. It includes what I’ve already accomplished, the modules I’m currently taking in a full stack bootcamp, and the goals I aim to achieve in the short and medium term.

cards.title: Completed
cards.description: Solid foundations gained via self-taught learning and hands-on personal projects.
highlights: Mastery of HTML and CSS for responsive websites
Basic use of Git and GitHub for version control
Strong JavaScript foundations and DOM manipulation
Knowledge of data structures and algorithms (ES6+)
Active participation in tech communities and personal projects

cards.title: In Progress
cards.description: Advanced modules of the full stack bootcamp, strengthening technical and teamwork skills.
highlights: Frontend development with React, Hooks, and Context API
Best practices with tokens, session management, and testing
Building RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express
Using MongoDB and SQL for relational and NoSQL databases
Implementing MVC architecture and JWT authentication

cards.title: Upcoming
cards.description: Focus on key technologies to scale real-world solutions and take on production-level challenges.
highlights: Developing fullstack MVPs using agile methodologies (SCRUM)
Setting up CI/CD environments with Docker and continuous integration
Web app performance optimization and security
Consuming external APIs and handling advanced async logic (EventLoop)
Preparing to contribute to open source projects
